00002  *  maven Programming Language

00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 #include "errors.h"
00011 #include "struct_MavenFunction.h"
00012 #include "objects.h"
00013 #include "functions.h"
00014 #include "compiler.h"
00015 #include "operators.h"

00017 MavenFunction dissectFunction(MavenCompiler* c, string line) {
00018         MavenFunction f;
00019         StringList parts = smartTokens(line);
00020         if(parts.length() < 2)
00021                 return f;
00022         
00023         // the keywords must go in this order
00024         // public/private external static returnType functionName(args) alias system func exports func
00025         f.atLine = c->lineNumber;
00026         
00027         // read keywords in order
00028         int i = 0;
00029         if(parts[i] == "external") ++i;
00030         
00031         if(parts[i] == "public") {
00032                 f.isPublic = true;
00033                 ++i;
00034         } else if(parts[i] == "private") {
00035                 f.isPublic = false;
00036                 ++i;
00037         }
00038         
00039         if(parts[i] == "static") {
00040                 f.isStatic = true;
00041                 ++i;
00042         }
00043         
00044         // if the expected return type is the same name as the class this COULD
00045         // BE a constructor, it could also just be a normal return type
00046         if(/*parts[i] == c->currentClass &&*/ parts[i + 1][0] == '(') {
00047                 f.returnType = "<constructor>";
00048                 //--i;
00049         } else {
00050                 f.returnType = findMavenObjectPath(c, parts[i++]);
00051                 if(f.returnType == MAVEN_INVALID) {
00052                         printAllNamespaces(c);
00053                         pushError(c, "Unknown object type %s", parts[i - 1]);
00054                         return f;
00055                 }
00056         }
00057         
00058         // function name
00059         f.name = parts[i++];
00060         if(f.name.length() > 8 && f.name.substr(0, 8) == "operator") {
00061                 f.name = translateOperatorFunction(f.name);
00062                 //cout << f.name << " -> " << translateOperatorFunction(f.name) << endl;
00063         }
00064         
00065         // function arguments
00066         smartAssertMessage(i < parts.length(),
00067                                 "i = %d, parts.length() = %d", i, parts.length());
00068         f.args = dissectArguments(c, parts[i++]);
00069         
00070         // if the function is not inside a class it has to be static and public
00071         if(c->currentClass == MAVEN_BARE_CLASS) {
00072                 f.isStatic = true;
00073                 f.isPublic = true;
00074         }
00075         
00076         // allowed exit point
00077         if(i == parts.length())
00078                 return f;
00079         
00080         // get message identifer
00081         if(parts[i][0] == '[') {
00082                 f.descArgs = "";
00083                 for(int j = 1; j < parts[i].length(); ++j) {
00084                         if(parts[i][j] == ']')
00085                                 break;
00086                         f.descArgs += parts[i][j];
00087                 }
00088                 ++i;
00089         }
00090         
00091         // allowed exit point
00092         if(i == parts.length())
00093                 return f;
00094         
00095         // get export
00096         if(parts[i] == "alias") {
00097                 ++i;
00098                 if(parts[i] == "system") {
00099                         f.alias_system = true;
00100                         ++i;
00101                 }
00102                 f.alias = parts[i++];
00103         }
00104         if(i == parts.length())
00105                 return f;
00106         
00107         if(parts[i] == "exports") {
00108                 MavenFunction exports;
00109                 exports.returnType = f.returnType;
00110                 exports.name = parts[i + 1];
00111                 if(!f.isStatic) {
00112                         MavenVariable self;
00113                         self.name = "self";
00114                         self.type = "maven.String";
00115                         exports.args.push(self);
00116                 }
00117                 exports.isStatic = f.isStatic;
00118                 for(int i = 0; i < f.args.length(); ++i)
00119                         exports.args.push(f.args[i]);
00120                 exports.alias_system = f.alias_system;
00121                 if(!exports.alias_system)
00122                         exports.alias = c->currentNamespace + "." + c->currentClass + "." + f.name;
00123                 else exports.alias = f.alias;
00124                 exports.isExported = true;
00125                 pushFunction(c, 0, 0, exports);
00126         }
00127         
00128         return f;
00129 }
